price: ឬមួយពួកគេមានឃ្លាំងលាភសក្ការៈនៃម្ចាស់របស់អ្នកដែល ទ្រង់មហាខ្លាំងពូកែ មហាសប្បុរស?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡوَهَّابِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu raḥmati rabbika al-ʿazīzi al-wahābi
